title: Remove rejected column - rejected ticks go to Ready
description:
Rejected ticks should return to agent queue, not sit in a separate column:
- Remove 'Rejected' column from index.html
- Remove rejected column from app.js column mapping
- Remove rejected column styles from style.css
- Update getColumn() in server.go: rejected+open returns 'ready' not 'rejected'
- Add visual indicator on card when tick has rejected verdict (e.g., small badge or border)
- Rejected feedback should be visible in notes

This aligns with the flow: human rejects -> agent sees feedback in notes -> agent retries
